name: CAO - Maduro - Toro
additionalNotes: CAO Maduro is a classically-blended beauty. Handmade in Nicaragua, these cigars feature dark Connecticut Broadleaf wrappers along with an eventful medley of Dominican and Nicaraguan tobaccos. Medium to full-bodied in strength, CAO Maduro offers a well-balanced, earthy foundation supported by a rich, mouthwatering sweetness provided by the Maduro wrapper.
